mapper.select: select tb_id, db_name, tb_name from tb_info where tb_name like concat('%', #{tb_name}, '%')
select col_id, tb_id, col_name, data_type, len, place, PK, not_null, uni from column_info where tb_id = (select tb_id from tb_info where tb_name = #{tb_name} and db_name = #{db_name});
show keys from ${db_name}.${tb_name} where Column_name = #{col_name} and Non_unique = 0;
select PK from column_info where PK = 1 and tb_id = (select tb_id from tb_info where tb_name = #{tb_name} and db_name = #{db_name})
select count(*) PrimaryNum from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE t where t.TABLE_NAME = concat(#{db_name}, '.', #{tb_name})
